articles.description: The first round of vaccinations Monday followed the worst week on record for Ohio as far as virus cases, deaths and hospitalizations.
articles.content:
COLUMBUS, Ohio The first vaccines against COVID-19 arrived in Ohio Monday, with frontline medical workers receiving the first doses.

articles.author: LAURAN NEERGAARD, Associated Press
articles.title: 'Relieved': US health workers start getting COVID-19 vaccine - Minneapolis Star Tribune
articles.description: Health care workers around the country rolled up their sleeves for the first COVID-19 shots Monday as hope that an all-out vaccination effort can defeat the coronavirus smacked up against the heartbreaking reality of 300,000 U.S. deaths.

articles.title: COVID-19 vaccine administered to first 5 frontline UPMC workers - WPXI Pittsburgh
articles.description: The first five UPMC employees were administered Pfizer’s COVID-19 vaccine, after the vaccines arrived in the area Monday.
articles.content:
PITTSBURGH — Five UPMC employees were the first in the state to be administered Pfizers COVID-19 vaccine, after the vaccines arrived in the area Monday.
